title: maraja
author: maraja
content: Hi everyone,  I'm new here. This is my first forum and my first topic. I've 10k avatar made with Blender and add-on BlendMyNFTs. They are ready to be launched but I don't know how create a mintable collection on OpenSea or Mintable etc...  Is there a book or a guide? because I'm very bad with minting Dapp, I don't know this "country" of "blockchain world". Thank you!!

comments.author: Hodoor
comments.body: You can start by checking this youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CFD_8oDxw1k&ab_channel=3DGladiatorIt's step by step guide on how to turn your art into an NFT on opensea, it's very simple to follow so you shouldn't face any problem.Hope that helped.

comments.author: maraja
comments.body: Thank you man, but i'm already able to mint an nft and then list it. Now I'd like to know how make a collection mintable by users that click an url on a landing page/website. I hope I'm clear, sorry for bad english skills.

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: Quote from: maraja on August 25, 2022, 06:26:29 PMThank you man, but i'm already able to mint an nft and then list it. Now I'd like to know how make a collection mintable by users that click an url on a landing page/website. I hope I'm clear, sorry for bad english skills.You mean users can see it via a landing page or website, right? The term is called "embed-ing NFT".There is a piece of information referred on Announcing embeddable NFTs about how to do it. Depending on how the website is built and your comprehension of web development, you can adjust the displayed NFTs or just simply use the default option.

comments.author: BitDane
comments.body: I think opensea can cover the creation of mintable collection.  You can find the instruction here: Create NFTs for Free on OpenSea.  It is free so you don't need to worry about the fundings.
